import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' export const CartItems = () => { const {getCartTotalAmount,all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext) return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0){ return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

{e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}}alt="" />
} return null; })}

Cart Total

Subtotal

${getCartTotalAmount()}

Shipping Fee

Free

Total

${getCartTotalAmount()}

If you have a promo code, enter it here

) }
